features: Audio Recording, Auto Power Save, Built-in Speaker, Date/Time Stamp, Direct Print, Interval Shooting Mode, PictBridge Support, Wi-Fi Ready, blur warning, camera orientation detection, cropping an image, digital image rotation, digital image stabilization (video mode), display brightness control, face-priority AF function, in-camera red-eye fix
operatingsystemsupported: Apple MacOS X 10.1.5 or later, MS Windows 2000, MS Windows 98 SE, MS Windows ME, MS Windows XP
screendetails: LCD display - TFT active matrix - 3" - colour
connectortypes: 1 x USB, 1 x composite video/audio output, 1 x docking station
flashmodes: Auto Mode, Fill-in mode, flash OFF mode, red-eye reduction, slow synchro
shootingprograms: Backlight, Beach/snow, Close-up, Copy, Dawn/dusk, Fireworks, Landscape, Museum, Night landscape, Night portrait, Panorama assist, Party/indoor, Portrait mode, Sports mode, Sunset
